about_the_game:
The most "different" love memoir is about to land on the STEAM platform. The new love simulation full-motion live-action interactive video work "Please! Please Confess First" is officially released on the STEAM platform! The story unfolds a heart-warming story from a first-person perspective with "Three-No Youth Hao Xingchen" as the background of the story. 6 heroines with different personalities, experiences, and styles appear in your life. "Love what you choose, choose what you love" a love journey of life is waiting for you to experience!

"Please! Please Confess First" is a carefully shot multi-scene live-action video, which expresses through the first-person perspective. All players are immersed in the story!

The story is not long, but it is unforgettable.

This is a game that carries the "past" of every boy

This is a "different" feeling

This is also the shadow of "every girl" at different stages

This is a game interactive drama with a "taste of memory", and it is not just a game interactive drama, maybe it is your past!

In "Please! Please Confess First", you will get along with 6 girls, the rabbit-like first love Bai Yueguang Xia Lin, the bear-like caring "good friend" Zhao Qiqi, the fox-like mysterious sister Wu Mengling, the cat-like domineering little princess Shen Xingyue, the dog-like soft and sticky little sister Mei Zhizhi, the hedgehog-style "defensive" cool girl Annie, what kind of life experience has created such a girl's personality? You need to experience it slowly. Every look, every information point, every expression of a sentence, every interaction, is full of real emotions, happy, sad, happy, all so real! Listen to your inner voice and make your own choice!

Innovative gameplay, in the world of "Please! Please Confess First", we provide psychological tests, and the test results for each player are completely different. We also have a gift-giving session in the game, you can Express your feelings in a specific plot! Every time you collect clues, you will see the girl's past and experience, which will let you see different "them". We provide exclusive ringtones, players can choose their favorite heroines and listen to their exclusive expressions to you!

This is a game about "past", "present" and "future". I hope you will have a different experience. This is "Please! Please confess first", welcome to our world!

Game introduction

"Please! Please confess first" is a "different" love simulation full-motion real-life interactive video work. The story unfolds a heart-warming story from the first-person perspective with "Three No Youth Hao Xingchen" as the background of the story. Six heroines with different personalities, experiences and styles appear in your life. "Love what you choose, choose what you love" a love journey of life is waiting for you to experience!

Rabbit-type first love white moonlight - Xia Lin

Bear-type caring "good friend" - Zhao Qiqi

Fox-type mysterious sister - Wu Mengling

Cat-type domineering little princess - Shen Xingyue

Woof-type soft and sticky little sister - Zhizhi

Hedgehog-type "defensive" cool girl - Aini

When you are with the girls, whose feelings do you care more about? Whose expression of love touches you the most? Choosing different girls will lead to different directions. "Important things cannot be seen with the eyes, but can be seen with the heart." Please be careful with every choice!

Product Features:

First-person perspective, immersive experience-

Use the first-person perspective to shoot, enhance the sense of scene and plot substitution, and bring you a completely immersive love interaction experience.

Super high appearance, ultimate experience-

Long hair, short hair, straight hair, curly hair, sweet sister, gentle and cold, domineering and brave, six heroines with different personalities bring you different love experiences!

Innovative gameplay, exclusive experience-

A "psychological test" is designed. After each player completes the test, the results "will be different"!

Real feelings, memory experience-

Many stories in the play are adapted from real experiences, so that everyone can reach empathy!

Creator's words:

This is the first time I write the creator's words. I typed countless words and deleted them.

Finally, I decided to say something from the heart.

Maybe these words are not so elegant Not so commercial

But every word is sincere

This is the first time for our entire team to make a game interactive drama. I am the producer and controller of the entire project. I am a 20+ girl. Because I had some experience in subjective perspective in 2019, the response was not bad. I was also the general producer of two dramas. I think that many game interactive dramas are also subjective. I should know what the audience wants. My partner and I hit it off and made such a "Please! Please confess first", but everything seems not as simple as I imagined. Since I am a game novice and I made a game, I didn’t have enough learning game links. Although I tried to consider it from the perspective of players, I did find that there are still many things to learn on the road ahead, but this "Please" is really trying to achieve the current ability within the current cognitive range! If there is "regret", I must be there, but I believe that every step is growth! If you don’t dare to take the first step bravely, how can you talk about "moving forward"~

Let’s talk about why you do such a subject?

I once had a screenwriter friend who jokingly asked me such a question. If one day on the podium, the host asked you why you made such a work, how would you answer! I pondered for a long time~ I said I wanted to make a work about "love" and "patience". At present, everyone is under great pressure at work and has great responsibilities. Everyone is very hard-working, so there is a lack of patience, patience for love, and patience for finding love. The older generation repaired things when they were broken, but now many of us want to replace things when they are broken, but will the next one be better? There is no perfect person in this world. Everyone becomes a certain way because of experience! There is no absolute "good or bad"~ Similarly, there is no "perfect lover" in this world. Everyone is independent and different. In the process of getting along, they understand and tolerate each other, complement each other and grow together. If everyone can listen patiently, feel and discover, they will definitely see different scenery and gain different happiness!

Let's talk about my friends in the team

Here I want to thank all the staff who participated in "Please! Please Confess First". Thank you for your support and tolerance for my work. This is not a polite remark, because I am really "too annoying". A UI chat interface has been changed n times. The post-production teacher also has to re-edit the video every time he tests it and finds that there is an extra second. Our programmers are also very hard-working. If I change a detail, he will follow up to change a bunch of codes. There are also the directors, producers, lighting, photography, recording, costumes, actors, stills, etc. in the early shooting process... Although we prepared online for a long time, there were only 3 days for offline preparation and 9 days for actual shooting. We finished the whole work. Everyone really stayed up all night. The heroines took turns to rest, but the staff had to work full-time. The costume teacher slept in the dressing room for several days... I really appreciate everyone's professional cooperation!

Here I would like to especially thank my partner

Our entire project is the first project of the two of us. We don’t have any angel investors. We only have ourselves. Many people joke that the two of us are a team. My partner is not a rich second-generation, but he trusts me and supports me. I am also working very hard to move forward. Although there are many difficulties on the road ahead, there are many things I don’t understand and I am learning. I am really working hard not to let both of us down! Don’t let all those who have contributed to this project down!

Here is what I want to say to all the players

First of all, I know that I must have some shortcomings and apologize to you here first, but if you feel it as a whole, you will really feel our intentions and attitudes. We really want to do this thing very hard! It can give everyone a good experience, a different experience. If you think there is anything wrong, you can leave a message in the comment area. I will read and reply to each one. I will patiently and seriously read everyone’s comments! Thank you for your support and I really hope you like it!

Finally, I would like to share with you a quote that I particularly like recently.

"Why do you have to be ready before you set out? You can never be 100% ready. You have to invest first and then keep improving. A rough start is the best start."

"Please! Confess first"

Come on! Come on! Come on!
